author: Indiesoft LLC
description: Mouse locking, cursor UI and mouselook for first-person 3D games made with Defold.
name: Pointer Lock

releases.message:
## What's Changed
* Implemented new mouse locking API of [Defold 1.3.7 BETA](https://forum.defold.com/t/defold-1-3-7-beta/71771).
* Removed internal C API to lock/unlock cursor.
* Cleaned up the demo project.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-pointer-lock/compare/1.0.0...2.0.0
